short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides the possibility to financially support any kind of content in the Internet media

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MakeCents lets you to give 99¢ to content providers of articles, videos, photos, or anything else you find on the internet. See something cool online? Don’t just like it, support it!
